sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form>
    <textarea v-model="props.newReplyContent" placeholder="Write a comment..." :rows="3" require></textarea>
    <button>Submit</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "CommentForm",
  props: {
    newReplyContent: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      replyContent: this.newReplyContent
    }
  }
}
</script>
